successes.title: Dungeon Lords Anniversary Edition
successes.description: Dungeon Lords, a game by Vlaada Chvátil, is 5 years old this year! To celebrate, we are making a special anniversary edition.

Pledges.description: IMP - Our Big Thanks and a High five!
DARLING IMP - Our Bigger Thanks and a Double High five!
GHOSTY – dungeon setup cards, bonus pets cards, food stickers. For US all shipping and fees included, for EU add $3 (VAT), for the rest of the world add $5 (shipping).
GOBLIN - The imp T-shirt. For US all shipping and fees included, for EU add $5 (VAT), for the rest of the world add $5 (shipping).

GHOST – 30 metal coins, food stickers, dungeon setup cards, rulebook for the "Dungeon Setup" and "Minions Bearing Gifts" mini-expansions (for people who want only the new stuff) PLUS all unlocked stretch goals marked with a smile. For US all shipping and fees included, for EU add $7 (VAT), for the rest of the world add $10 (shipping).

OOZE – 30 metal coins, food stickers, dungeon setup cards, rulebook for the "Dungeon Setup" and "Minions Bearing Gifts" mini-expansions (for people who want only the new stuff) in Dungeon Lords: Happy Anniversary box with handy insert PLUS all unlocked stretch goals marked with a smile PLUS plastic containers for quicker setup. For US all shipping and fees included, for EU add $7 (VAT), for the rest of the world add $10 (shipping). Add $80 ($96 for EU residents) if you would like the game in a special Kickstarter-only wooden case.

OOZE – 30 metal coins, food stickers, dungeon setup cards, rulebook for the "Dungeon Setup" and "Minions Bearing Gifts" mini-expansions (for people who want only the new stuff) in Dungeon Lords: Happy Anniversary box with handy insert PLUS all unlocked stretch goals marked with a smile PLUS plastic containers for quicker setup. For US all shipping and fees included, for EU add $11 (VAT), for the rest of the world add $10 (shipping). Add $80 ($96 for EU residents) if you would like the game in a special Kickstarter-only wooden case.

WARRIOR – A special price for one copy of Dungeon Lords: Happy Anniversary PLUS all unlocked stretch goals. For US all shipping and fees included, for EU add $16 (VAT), for the rest of the world add $15 (shipping).

VETERAN WARRIOR – A special price for one copy of Dungeon Lords: Happy Anniversary PLUS all unlocked stretch goals. For US all shipping and fees included, for EU add $17 (VAT), for the rest of the world add $15 (shipping).

SEASONED WARRIOR – One copy of Dungeon Lords: Happy Anniversary PLUS all unlocked stretch goals. (The regular price.) For US all shipping and fees included, for EU add $18 (VAT), for the rest of the world add $15 (shipping).

MIGHTY WARRIOR – One copy of Dungeon Lords: Happy Anniversary PLUS all unlocked stretch goals. (Same as "Seasoned Warrior", but at an irregular price.) For US all shipping and fees included, for EU add $19 (VAT), for the rest of the world add $15 (shipping).

IMP FRIENDS – One copy of Dungeon Lords: Happy Anniversary PLUS all unlocked stretch goals PLUS a second set of all the new stuff (30 metal coins, food stickers, dungeon setup cards, rulebook for the "Dungeon Setup" and "Minions Bearing Gifts" mini-expansions) PLUS a second set of all unlocked stretch goals marked with a smile. For US all shipping and fees included, for EU add $22 (VAT), for the rest of the world add $15 (shipping).

PALADIN – A special price for one copy of Dungeon Lords: Happy Anniversary in a special Kickstarter-only wooden case PLUS all unlocked stretch goals. For US all shipping and fees included, for EU add $32 (VAT), for the rest of the world add $15 (shipping).

SEASONED PALADIN – One copy of Dungeon Lords: Happy Anniversary in a special Kickstarter-only wooden case PLUS all unlocked stretch goals. (Regular price.) For US all shipping and fees included, for EU add $34 (VAT), for the rest of the world add $15 (shipping).

DUNGEON GIRL – One copy of Dungeon Lords: Happy Anniversary PLUS all unlocked stretch goals PLUS Dungeon Petz PLUS Dungeon Petz: Dark Alleys. Add $80 if you would like Dungeon Lords: Happy Anniversary to come in a special Kickstarter-only wooden case. For US all shipping and fees included, for EU add $34 (VAT), for the rest of the world add $15 (shipping).

MIGHTY PALADIN – One copy of Dungeon Lords: Happy Anniversary in a special Kickstarter-only wooden case PLUS all unlocked stretch goals. (Irregular price.) For US all shipping and fees included, for EU add $35 (VAT), for the rest of the world add $15 (shipping).

FROZEN FRIENDS – One copy of Dungeon Lords: Happy Anniversary in a special Kickstarter-only wooden case PLUS all unlocked stretch goals PLUS a second set of all the new stuff (30 metal coins, food stickers, dungeon setup cards, rulebook for the "Dungeon Setup" and "Minions Bearing Gifts" mini-expansions) PLUS a second set of all unlocked stretch goals marked with a smile. For US all shipping and fees included, for EU add $38 (VAT), for the rest of the world add $15 (shipping).

RETAILER – for brick & mortar shops only! You can get games directly from us at retailers prices + one demo copy for your shop. This is the only way you can get the Kickstarter-only things for your customers. You will be able to get the whole games and also the upgrade kits (Ghost level). Before pledging, please contact us at sales@czechgames.com. Send us proof that you have a brick & mortar shop and we will send you a price list with details of shipping & other fees. You will then be able to make your pledge.

GOLEM – One copy of Dungeon Lords: Happy Anniversary PLUS all unlocked stretch goals PLUS a unique watercolor picture of one adventurer, monster, or pet of your choice, hand drawn and signed by David Cochard just for you. For US all shipping and fees included, for EU add $60 (VAT), for the rest of the world add $15 (shipping). Add $80 ($96 for EU residents) if you would like the game in a special Kickstarter-only wooden case.

DRAGON – One copy of Dungeon Lords: Happy Anniversary PLUS all unlocked stretch goals PLUS a unique watercolor Dungeon lords action scene, hand-drawn and signed by David Cochard just for you. For US all shipping and fees included, for EU add $120 (VAT), for the rest of the world add $15 (shipping). Add $80 ($96 for EU residents) if you would like the game in a special Kickstarter-only wooden case.

CTHULHU – One copy of Dungen Lords: Happy Anniversary PLUS all unlocked stretch goals PLUS your face appears as a side character in the comics PLUS picture of that character, hand-drawn and signed by David Cochard  PLUS your name as "guest starring" in the credits.
For US all shipping and fees included, for EU add $140 (VAT), for the rest of the world add $15 (shipping). Add $80 ($96 for EU residents) if you would like the game in a special Kickstarter-only wooden case.

ULTIMATE FAN – One copy of Dungeon Lords: Happy Anniversary in the special Kickstarter-only wooden case PLUS a unique picture of one adventurer, monster, or pet of your choice, hand-drawn and signed by David Cochard PLUS a picture handdrawn by Vlaada with dedication and signature PLUS an invitation to a CGE 2015 playtesting event for you and a friend. (Accommodation, meal plan, and themed T-Shirts included. Travel costs not included.) All Shipping and taxes included, no matter where you live.
